mapper.sql: coupongroup_id, coupongroup_no, coupongroup_title, coupongroup_detail, coupon_ids, coupon_nos, issued_type, consume_money, consume_times, DATE_FORMAT( start_rated_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) start_rated_time, DATE_FORMAT(end_rated_time, '%Y-%m-%d') end_rated_time
mapper.select:
select
from `sys_coupon_group` where 1=1
and coupongroup_no LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{coupongroup_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and coupongroup_title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{coupongroup_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
and FIND_IN_SET(#{coupongroup_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},issued_type)>0
mapper.update: update sys_coupon set coupongroup_title = #{coupongroup_title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupongroup_detail = #{coupongroup_detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_ids = #{coupon_ids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_nos = #{coupon_nos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issued_type = #{issued_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_rated_time=#{start_rated_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_rated_time=#{end_rated_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, consume_money = #{consume_money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consume_times = #{consume_times,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastmodify_person_id=#{lastmodify_person_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastmodify_time=#{lastmodify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where coupongroup_id = #{coupongroup_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
